text: Barbara Lawrence (February 24, 1930 â€“ November 13, 2013)Harris M. Lentz III, Obituaries in the Performing Arts, 2013 (Jefferson, NC: McFarland Publishing, 2014), p. 213 was an American actress, writer, real estate businessperson and model. She played Gertie Cummings in the movie version of Oklahoma!. She also played Marybelle in Margie. In 1962, after retiring from acting, she worked in real estate.Johnny D. Boggs, Jesse James and the Movies (Jefferson, NC: McFarland Publishing, 2011), p. 148 Lawrence was born in Carnegie, Oklahoma and died of kidney failure in Los Angeles. == References == Category:Actors from Oklahoma Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in the United States Category:1930 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Barbara Lawrence
